EmailTemplate.subject: Your early sign-up offer expires on {!Contact.School_s_discount_deadline__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NCS powered by The Challenge
NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG
Last chance to sign up for £35
Hey {!Contact.FirstName},
NCS is a great way of meeting new people and and gaining skills you can't learn in class.
Check out what Suli has to say below. www.youtube.com/watch?v=xL412DXUBDI
For more info click on the link below http://www.ncsthechallenge.org/programme/
Or Sign Up Now! https://bookings.ncsthechallenge.org/
VISIT NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG NOW

You are receiving this email because you have registered your interest for NCS. Want to update your preferences or unsubscribe? Please email us at contact@ncsthechallenge.org or call us on 0203 542 2400.
